outline:
1. to dissolve, melt
    1. (Qal) to waste away
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to melt, vanish, drop off, melt away
      2. to faint, grow fearful (fig.)
      3. wasted, worthless (participle)
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to melt
kjv_def: discourage, faint, be loosed, melt (away), refuse, [idiom] utterly.
strongs_def: to liquefy; figuratively, to waste (with disease), to faint (with fatigue, fear or grief)
